text:
Created attachment 17773
unfied diff against trunk

partial implementation of JTidy to clean up the content produced by FCK (work
in progress). You need to add the JTidy.jar to your lib/
(http://sourceforge.net/projects/jtidy)
creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com

text:
Is Jtidy.jar really needed?  I use the html generator without problems, and it
uses jtidy.
creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
renaud.richardet@wyona.com
text:
Nice! I didn't know that. How do you do it?
Thanks, Ren

creator: nettings@apache.org
text: richard, can you comment on this bug and maybe close it?
Tidy code is already in Fckeditor.java. Jar file comes with cocoon.
